title: How to Create a Character in Destiny

steps.headline: Choose your class.
steps.description: You can choose between Titan (heavy), Hunter (assassin), or Warlock (assault).

steps.headline: Choose your race.
steps.description: You can choose between Human, Awoken, or Exo.

steps.headline: Customize the head.
steps.description: You can change the shape, tone, and hair color (if you chose Exo, you can change its headpiece instead of hair).

steps.headline: You are done!
steps.description: Begin the mission to send your Guardian into action.

text: At the main menu, press 'A/X/LMB'. Hit "Create a New Character". Choose your class. You can choose between Titan (heavy), Hunter (assassin), or Warlock (assault). Choose your race. You can choose between Human, Awoken, or Exo. Begin customization. First, choose your gender. Customize the head. You can change the shape, tone, and hair color (if you chose Exo, you can change its headpiece instead of hair). Choose any markings you want.  You are done! Begin the mission to send your Guardian into action.
